item.title: 美国议员就投资承诺向汽车制造商斯泰兰特施压
item.description: 包括参议院两大民主党人在内的近 80 名国会议员周三敦促汽车制造商斯太朗斯履行其与美国汽车工人工会签订的合同中的投资承诺。【原文：Nearly 80 members of Congress, including the Senate's top two Democrats, on Wednesday urged automaker Stellantis to honor investment commitments that are part of its contract with the United Auto Workers union.】

item.title: 联合租赁公司第三季度利润低于预期，原因是利润率下降
item.description: 联合租赁公司（United Rentals）周三公布的第三季度利润不及预期，原因是该公司所有设备租赁部门的利润率均有所下降。【原文：United Rentals missed third-quarter profit estimates on Wednesday, on lower margins across all of the equipment rental company's segments.】

item.title: 波音国防业务是 "核心"，但新任首席执行官面临重重困难
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）预计，这家飞机制造商的国防业务将在预算紧缩的旧合同重压下继续挣扎，但他在周三表示，尽管存在许多问题，但生产直升机、战斗机和导弹的部门仍然是公司未来的 "核心"。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg anticipates the planemaker's defense business will continue to struggle under the weight of budget-busting older contracts, but he said on Wednesday that despite many problems the unit making helicopters, fighter jets and missiles remains "core" to the company's future.】

item.title: Ameriprise Financial 公布第三季度利润增长，得益于强劲的手续费收入
item.description: 美国财务顾问公司 Ameriprise Financial 周三公布第三季度利润增长 11%，原因是市场反弹提升了客户资产价值，帮助该公司赚取了更多的费用收入。【原文：U.S. financial adviser firm Ameriprise Financial reported a 11% rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, as a market rally boosted the value of its client's assets, helping the firm earn more in fee income.】

item.title: 美国监管机构仍陷于僵局，巴塞尔首席执行官敦促各国完善资本规则
item.description: 国际监管机构巴塞尔银行监管委员会（BCBS）主席周三为其提高风险管理标准的努力辩护，并敦促监管机构尽快完成巴塞尔资本规则的最终版本。【原文：The chair of the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision (BCBS), the international regulatory body, on Wednesday defended its efforts to boost risk management standards and urged regulators to quickly complete the final set of Basel capital rules.】

item.title: 澳门业务疲软，拉斯维加斯金沙第三季度利润不及预期
item.description: 拉斯维加斯金沙集团（Las Vegas Sands）周三公布的季度利润未能达到分析师的预期，主要原因是其位于澳门的伦敦人赌场（Londoner casino）正在进行翻修，而新加坡赌场的每张赌桌收入低于预期。【原文：Las Vegas Sands missed analysts' expectations for quarterly profit on Wednesday, hit by an ongoing renovation at its Londoner casino in Macao and lower-than-expected per table income in Singapore.】

item.title: 阿根廷 8 月份经济活动萎缩程度低于预期
item.description: 阿根廷官方统计机构周三表示，阿根廷 8 月份经济活动比 7 月份增长 0.2%，环比降幅低于预期，这是南美国家连续第三个月出现同比萎缩。【原文：Argentina's economic activity grew 0.2% in August from July and fell less than expected from a year ago in the South American country's third straight month of year-on-year contraction, its official statistics agency said on Wednesday.】

item.title: IBM第三季度利润超出预期，得益于软件业务的强劲增长
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）周三公布的第三季度利润超出分析师预期，这主要得益于其高利润率软件部门的强劲增长，因为企业优先考虑IT服务支出，并加倍努力采用人工智能。【原文：International Business Machines beat analysts' estimates for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by robust growth in its high-margin software segment as businesses prioritized spending on its IT services and doubled down on AI adoption.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛第三季度净利润下降 5
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部周四公布，其第三季度净利润同比下降 5%，降至 129.3 亿比索。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit posted on Thursday a 5% year-on-year dip in its third-quarter net profit to 12.93 billion pesos.】

item.title: 美泰在假日购物前下调销售预期；成本控制提升利润率
item.description: 芭比娃娃母公司美泰公司周三下调了全年销售预期，因为在玩具需求低迷的背景下，该公司即将进入关键的假日购物季。【原文：Mattel lowered its full-year sales forecast on Wednesday as the Barbie parent heads into the crucial holiday shopping season against the backdrop of muted demand for toys.】

item.title: 特斯拉预计 2024 年汽车交付量将略有增长
item.description: 特斯拉周三表示，预计今年的汽车交付量将略有增长，并公布第三季度利润率高于预期，盘后股价上涨 5%。【原文：Tesla said on Wednesday it expects to achieve slight growth in vehicle deliveries this year and reported a higher-than-expected profit margin for the third quarter, sending shares up 5% after hours.】

item.title: 因成本增加，顶级金矿商纽蒙特第三季度利润不及预期
item.description: 纽蒙特公司周三未能达到华尔街对其第三季度利润的预期，原因是成本上升和内华达州产量下降拖累了这家全球最大的黄金生产商。【原文：Newmont missed Wall Street expectations for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, as higher costs and lower production in Nevada weighed on the world's largest gold producer.】

item.title: 受高端计划需求推动，T-Mobile 无线用户增长超出预期
item.description: T-Mobile 美国公司周三公布的季度无线用户新增数超出华尔街预期，原因是更多用户选择了捆绑 Netflix 等流媒体服务的折扣计划，这使其股价上涨了 3%。【原文：T-Mobile US on Wednesday exceeded Wall Street expectations for quarterly wireless subscriber additions as more customers chose its discounted plans that bundle streaming services like Netflix, sending its shares up 3%.】

item.title: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）报道，美国司法部就百万美元赠款警告马斯克的超级政治行动委员会
item.description: 据美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）周三援引知情人士的话报道，美国司法部已致函埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的超级政治行动委员会（super PAC），警告这位亿万富翁、特斯拉首席执行官的 100 万美元赠款可能违反了联邦法律。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department has sent a letter to Elon Musk's super PAC warning that the billionaire Tesla CEO's $1 million giveaways may violate federal law, CNN reported on Wednesday, citing people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行与德国商业银行的交易应根据财务实力来判断 - 意大利银行
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者、意大利央行行长法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）周三表示，欧洲央行在评估意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）与德国商业银行（Commerzbank）之间的任何交易时，应完全以交易后银行的稳固性而非国家利益为基础。【原文：The European Central Bank should evaluate any deal between Italian lender UniCredit and Germany's Commerzbank purely based on the solidity of the resulting bank rather than national interests, ECB policymaker and Governor of the Bank of Italy Fabio Panetta said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本央行行长称持续实现通胀目标 "仍需时日
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫周三表示，基本通胀率一直在缓慢上升，但日本要以可持续的方式实现央行2%的通胀目标 "仍需时日"。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Wednesday that underlying inflation has been rising slowly, but it was "still taking time" for the country to achieve the central bank's 2% inflation target in a sustainable manner.】

item.title: 美国国会议员要求就华为设备中的台积电芯片给出答案
item.description: 美国众议院中国问题委员会共和党主席周三要求美国商务部和台积电做出答复，因为在中国华为公司生产的设备中发现了台积电生产的芯片。【原文：The Republican chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Committee on China demanded answers on Wednesday from the Commerce Department and TSMC after a chip made by the Taiwanese company was found in a device made by China's Huawei.】

item.title: 纽约联储称银行通过延长贷款期限掩盖商业地产风险
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周三发布的一份文件称，银行一直在调整商业房地产抵押贷款的条款，以掩盖损失，在推迟清算日的同时，也增加了更广泛的金融体系的风险。【原文：Banks have been tweaking the terms of commercial real estate mortgages to obscure losses, and in delaying the day of reckoning, are increasing risks to the broader financial system, a paper released Wednesday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said.】

item.title: 路透社活动-尽管对中国竞争对手征收关税，美国汽车制造商仍被敦促创新
item.description: 美国汽车制造商及其供应商的领导人本周在底特律举行的路透社活动上表示，在对中国竞争对手征收关税带来一些短期缓解的同时，汽车行业不能沾沾自喜。【原文：Leaders from American automakers and their suppliers said at a Reuters event in Detroit this week that the industry cannot afford complacency while tariffs on Chinese competitors provide some short-term relief.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，最近几周美国经济活动变化不大
item.description: 9 月至 10 月初，美国经济活动变化不大，但企业招聘人数有所增加，延续了近期的趋势，这增强了人们对美联储将在两周内选择将借贷成本下调 25 个基点的预期。【原文：U.S. economic activity was little changed from September through early October while firms saw an uptick in hiring, continuing recent trends that have reinforced expectations the Federal Reserve will opt for a smaller 25-basis-point reduction in borrowing costs in two weeks.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩根大通希望恢复液化天然气实物交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，摩根大通正在就时隔十多年后恢复液化天然气（LNG）实物交易进行谈判。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is in talks to resume trading physical liquefied natural gas (LNG) after more than a decade, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 电信集团起诉阻止美国联邦贸易委员会的 "点击取消 "规则
item.description: 一个代表有线电视和互联网供应商的行业组织周三与另外两家公司一起提起诉讼，要求阻止美国联邦贸易委员会的一项规定，该规定要求各公司提供简单的取消订阅机制。【原文：An industry group representing cable and internet providers sued along with two others on Wednesday to block a U.S. Federal Trade Commission rule that requires companies to offer simple cancellation mechanisms for subscriptions.】

item.title: 桥水称美联储独立性是美国大选的首要关注点
item.description: 据路透社查阅，对冲基金桥水联合公司（Bridgewater Associates）在周二发给客户的一份评论中称，美联储的独立性可能是美国总统大选中的首要问题。【原文：Hedge fund Bridgewater Associates said the Federal Reserve independence is probably a top issue in the U.S. presidential election, according to a commentary sent to clients on Tuesday and reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 纽约调查 Capital One-Discover 合并是否违反反垄断法
item.description: 纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）正在调查 Capital One 收购 Discover Financial Services 的提议是否违反了该州的反垄断法。【原文：New York Attorney General Letitia James is investigating whether Capital One's proposed takeover of Discover Financial Services violates the state's antitrust law.】

item.title: 初创公司 Hugging Face 旨在通过开源产品削减人工智能成本
item.description: 抱抱脸公司周三表示，它将与亚马逊公司、Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司和其他公司共同发布一款新的开源软件产品，旨在降低构建聊天机器人和其他人工智能系统的成本。【原文：Hugging Face on Wednesday said it is releasing a new open-source software offering with Amazon.com , Alphabet's Google and others aimed at lowering the costs for building chatbots and other AI systems.】

item.title: 全球需求疲软，米其林季度销售额不及预期
item.description: 法国轮胎制造商米其林公司周三表示，由于需求疲软，该公司第三季度销售额下降了 4.2%，略低于市场预期。【原文：Michelin's third-quarter sales dropped by 4.2%, slightly missing market expectations due to weaker demand, the French tyre maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 微软称中国影响力行动瞄准美国下选区选举
item.description: 据微软公司周三发布的最新研究报告称，一支由中国人控制的社交媒体机器人大军正试图影响阿拉巴马州、得克萨斯州和田纳西州的选民，同时诋毁美国佛罗里达州参议员马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）。【原文：An army of Chinese-controlled social media bots is attempting to influence voters in Alabama, Texas and Tennessee, while denigrating U.S. Senator Marco Rubio of Florida, according to new research published on Wednesday by Microsoft .】

item.title: 古驰（Gucci）销售额下滑，Kering 对 2024 年年度营业利润发出警告
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）周三警告称，由于中国市场需求疲软加深了其主要品牌古驰（Gucci）的困境，该集团第三季度销售额降幅超过预期，全年营业收入将减少近一半。【原文：French luxury goods group Kering warned on Wednesday its full-year operating income would almost halve after reporting a larger-than-expected drop in third quarter sales, as weak demand in China deepened the struggles of its main label Gucci.】

item.title: 贝克休斯预计利润率将因强劲的订单积压而上升
item.description: 贝克休斯周三预测，在第三季度利润超过华尔街预期后，第四季度和明年的税前利润率将继续增长。【原文：Baker Hughes on Wednesday forecast continued pretax margin gains in the fourth quarter and next year after beating Wall Street estimates for its third-quarter profit.】

item.title: 壳牌挫败尼日利亚吸引投资的努力
item.description: 分析人士说，尼日利亚本周决定阻止壳牌公司出售其价值 24 亿美元的陆上资产，这向投资者发出了一个消极信号，即尼日利亚急需加强其至关重要的石油行业。【原文：Nigeria's decision this week to block Shell's $2.4 billion sale of its onshore assets has sent a negative signal to investors the country urgently needs to strengthen its all-important oil sector, analysts said.】
